info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 10 at 3:46PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Moderate to heavy snow showers and gusty winds will impact portions of southeastern Lewis and Clark and northern Jefferson Counties through 430 PM MST... At 343 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking moderate to heavy snow along a line extending from 19 miles northwest of Helena to 9 miles east of Deer Lodge. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Moderate to heavy snow, wind gusts up to 40 mph, and visibility as low as a half mile or less. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hazardous driving conditions. Locations impacted include... Helena, East Helena, Montana City, Wolf Creek, Wickes, Rimini, Alhambra, Corbin, Spring Meadow Lake State Park, Austin, Marysville, Craig, Clancy, Canyon Creek, Black Sandy State Park and Jefferson City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
